
                            
                            <p>建行app，约惠浙里，惠支付，里面中石油会员，应该是余额大于2k，领15元中石油立减金，可直接充油卡15.1抵扣15 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/16/133825wjmbdotnss54omjm.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/16/133825wjmbdotnss54omjm.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/16/133857upeqyiylrrmibyrz.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/16/133857upeqyiylrrmibyrz.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/16/133938bo3zb99sozs4ojsm.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/16/133938bo3zb99sozs4ojsm.jpg"> <br> 	    	     <br> </p><p class="pl">还有购买4.5立减金的活动，一起差不多20毛</p>
